00073 /*
00074    Header to request specific standard support. Before including it, one
00075    of the following symbols must be defined (1003.1-1988 isn't supported):
00076 
00077      SUV_POSIX1990  for 1003.1-1990
00078      SUV_POSIX1993  for 1003.1b-1993 - real-time
00079      SUV_POSIX1996  for 1003.1-1996
00080      SUV_SUS1       for Single UNIX Specification, v. 1 (UNIX 95)
00081      SUV_SUS2       for Single UNIX Specification, v. 2 (UNIX 98)
00082      SUV_SUS3       for Single UNIX Specification, v. 3
00083 */
